name: Kaz HeadLines
description:
Welcome to the world of HeadLines puzzles by Kaz. HeadLines are word puzzles, distant cousins of crossword puzzles and similar to acrostics, where you fill in answers to clues, and the letters go into a grid which spells out a fictional headline from the given year. This app contains a handful of free sample puzzles. If you like them, follow the link in the app to download Crostix Free, where you can buy a book of 50 HeadLines for only $1.99.

For more information about HeadLines, and about Kaz, visit http://www.kazfun.com.
